short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens the image in a viewer with pan and zoom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Images in google docs can sometimes be hard to view. 

This extension opens a new window where users can copy and paste the image.

The user can then pan and zoom the image to view it in detail.

Hold and drag the left mouse button to pan and use scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
